00226 //----- Begin of function Department::course_report ------//
00230 void Department::course_report(int refreshFlag) {
00231     if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_INSTITUTION_OVERVIEW) {
00232         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_INSTITUTION;
00233         sys.is_institution_report=1;
00234         course_report_1(refreshFlag);
00235     }
00236     else if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_DEPARTMENT_OVERVIEW) {
00237         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_DEPARTMENT;
00238         sys.is_institution_report=0;
00239         course_report_1(refreshFlag);
00240     }
00241     else if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_INSTITUTION_SUMMERTEACHING) {
00242         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_INSTITUTION;
00243         sys.is_institution_report=1;
00244         course_report_4(refreshFlag);
00245     }
00246     else if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_DEPARTMENT_CLASSTYPES) {
00247         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_DEPARTMENT;
00248         sys.is_institution_report=0;
00249         course_report_2(refreshFlag);
00250     }
00251 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00252     else if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_INSTITUTION_TECHNOLOGY) {
00253         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_INSTITUTION;
00254         sys.is_institution_report=1;
00255         course_report_5(refreshFlag);
00256     }
00257     else if(department_array.current_report_type==REPORT_TYPE_DEPARTMENT_TECHNOLOGY) {
00258         current_report_mode=REPORT_MODE_DEPARTMENT;
00259         sys.is_institution_report=0;
00260         course_report_5(refreshFlag);
00261     }
00262 #endif
00263 }
00264 
00265 //------- End of function FacultySummary::report ------//

00803 void Department::course_report_2(int refreshFlag) {

01141 void Department::course_report_5(int refreshFlag) {
01142     const static int vtab1=21;
01143     const static int vtab2=51;
01144     const static int vtab3=51;
01145     const static int vtab4=201;
01146     const static int vtab5=211;
01147     const static int vtab6=350;
01148     const static int tab1=TABLE_X1;
01149     const static int tab2=TABLE_X1+250;
01150     const static int tab3=TABLE_X1+250;
01151     const static int tab4=TABLE_X1+470;
01152     const static int tab5=TABLE_X1+470;
01153     const static int tab6=TABLE_X2-10;
01154 
01155     int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01156     Department* deptPtr = department_array[deptRecno];
01157     int sliderVar1=deptPtr->department_incentives;
01158     int sliderVar2=deptPtr->ease_outsourcing_credits;
01159     int sliderVar3=deptPtr->distance_learning_credits;
01160 
01161     vga.use_back();
01162 
01163     if ( (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) || (info.is_begin_trimester()) ) {
01164         if(report_init_flag)
01165             course_report_deinit();
01166         report_init_flag=1;
01167 
01168         // used to store the three graphs data
01169         static float  dataArray[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT];
01170         static int  dataArray2[HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT];
01171         // used to store the three graphs data
01172         static int  dataArray3[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT];
01173         static int  numSeriesData = HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT;
01174         static int  numSeriesData2 = HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
01175 
01176         memset( dataArray, 0, sizeof(dataArray) );
01177         memset( dataArray2, 0, sizeof(dataArray2) );
01178         memset( dataArray3, 0, sizeof(dataArray3) );
01179 
01180         //------------- paint the background ----------------//
01181         user_interface.bg_img(BG_PIC_ID, &vga_back);
01182 
01183         user_interface.brighten(tab1,REPORT_Y1+vtab3,tab6,REPORT_Y1+vtab6);
01184 
01185         user_interface.brighten(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-5,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1+14);
01186         user_interface.rect(REPORT_X1+100,REPORT_Y1-5,REPORT_X1+630,REPORT_Y1+14,1);
01187         font_charts.put(REPORT_X1+180,REPORT_Y1-2,"Information Technology and Distance Learning Credits");
01188 
01189         int shiftNumber;
01190         if ( player_school.is_trimester_off ) {
01191             if ( player_school.cur_trimester != 0 )
01192                 shiftNumber = player_school.cur_trimester - 1;
01193             else
01194                 shiftNumber = 2;
01195         }
01196         else
01197             shiftNumber = player_school.cur_trimester;
01198 
01199         if ( current_report_mode==REPORT_MODE_INSTITUTION ) {
01200             for ( int i=0; i<HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT; i++ ) {
01201                 for ( int j=department_array.size(); j>0; j-- ) {
01202                     if ( department_array.is_deleted(j) )
01203                         continue;
01204 
01205                     dataArray[i] += department_array[j]->p_tech_utilization_history[i];
01206                     dataArray3[i] += department_array[j]->distance_credits_provided_history[i];
01207                 }
01208                 dataArray[i] /= department_array.size();
01209                 dataArray[i] = (int) dataArray[i];
01210             }
01211 
01212             for ( i=0; i<HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT; i++ ) {
01213                 for ( int j=department_array.size(); j>0; j-- ) {
01214                     if ( department_array.is_deleted(j) )
01215                         continue;
01216 
01217                     int index = HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT - shiftNumber - (HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT-1-i)*3 - 1;
01218                     dataArray2[i] += department_array[j]->course_array.outsourcing_credits_history[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD][index];
01219                 }
01220             }
01221 
01222         }
01223         else {
01224             for ( int i=0; i<HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT; i++ ) {
01225                 dataArray[i] = (int)deptPtr->p_tech_utilization_history[i];
01226                 dataArray3[i] = (int)deptPtr->distance_credits_provided_history[i];
01227             }
01228             for ( i=0; i<HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT; i++ ) {
01229                 int index = HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT - shiftNumber - (HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT-1-i)*3 - 1;
01230                 dataArray2[i] = (int)deptPtr->course_array.outsourcing_credits_history[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD][index];
01231             }
01232         }
01233

01366             type_button_group[i].create_text(x, y,
01367                                              x+BOTTOM_BUTTON_WIDTH, y+BOTTOM_BUTTON_HEIGHT,
01368                                              reportTypeStrArray[i]);
01369         }
01370         type_button_group.paint(department_array.current_report_type);
01371     }
01372 
01373     vga.blt_buf(ZOOM_X1, ZOOM_Y1, ZOOM_X2, ZOOM_Y2);
01374 }
01375 
01376 //
01377 // --- End of Department::course_report_5 --- //
01378 #endif

01436 
01437 int Department::course_report_detect() {
01438     //------- detect type buttons --------//
01439     int summaryButtonGroupDetect;
01440 
01441     if((summaryButtonGroupDetect = type_button_group.detect()) >= 0) {
01442         //              type_button_group[department_array.current_report_type].body_ptr = (void *) (type_button_up_bitmap[department_array.current_report_type] + 4);
01443         department_array.current_report_type = summaryButtonGroupDetect;
01444         //              type_button_group[department_array.current_report_type].body_ptr = (void *) (type_button_down_bitmap[department_array.current_report_type] + 4);
01445         sys.redraw_all_flag = 1;
01446         return 1;
01447     }
01448 
01449     /*  if(department_array.current_report_type == REPORT_TYPE_INSTITUTION_SUMMERTEACHING)
01450       if(
01451         ((*mode_course_rbv.sel_num)==1)||
01452         ((*mode_course_rbv.sel_num)==2)||
01453         ((*mode_course_rbv.sel_num)==3)
01454         )
01455       {
01456         if(mode_course_valueslider4.detect())
01457         {       player_school.percent_summer_teaching_load=*(mode_course_valueslider4.var_ptr);
01458           return 1;
01459         }
01460   }
01461   */
01462     if(department_array.current_report_type == REPORT_TYPE_INSTITUTION_SUMMERTEACHING) {
01463         help.set_help(TABLE_X1,REPORT_Y1+82,
01464                       TABLE_X2,REPORT_Y1+450,"H3.2.1.");
01465 
01466         if (mode_course_rbv.detect()) {
01467             player_school.summer_emphasis=*(mode_course_rbv.sel_num);
01468             return 1;
01469         }
01470     }
01471 
01472 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
01473     if ( department_array.current_report_type == REPORT_TYPE_DEPARTMENT_TECHNOLOGY ) {
01474         if ( mode_course_technology_slider[0].detect() ) {
01475             // change the value for the departmental incentives for fculty to optimize IT in teaching
01476             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01477             Department* deptPtr = department_array[deptRecno];
01478             deptPtr->department_incentives = *(mode_course_technology_slider[0].var_ptr);
01479         }
01480         if ( mode_course_technology_slider[1].detect() ) {
01481             // change the value for the ease of outsourcing credits for closed courses
01482             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01483             Department* deptPtr = department_array[deptRecno];
01484             deptPtr->ease_outsourcing_credits = *(mode_course_technology_slider[1].var_ptr);
01485         }
01486         if ( mode_course_technology_slider[2].detect() ) {
01487             // change the value for priority for provision of distance learning credits
01488             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01489             Department* deptPtr = department_array[deptRecno];
01490             deptPtr->distance_learning_credits = *(mode_course_technology_slider[2].var_ptr);
01491         }
01492     }
01493 #endif
01494 
01495     if(department_array.current_report_type == REPORT_TYPE_DEPARTMENT_CLASSTYPES) {
01496         help.set_help(TABLE_X1+470,REPORT_Y1+200,TABLE_X1+690,REPORT_Y1+340,"H3.1.1.");
01497         if(mode_course_valueslider1.detect()) {
01498             double sliderVar1,sliderVar2,sliderVar3,total;
01499             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01500             Department* cur_dept_ptr = department_array[deptRecno];
01501             sliderVar1=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01502             sliderVar2=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01503             sliderVar3=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01504             total=sliderVar2+sliderVar3;
01505             if(total>1E-9) {
01506                 *(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr)=
01507                     (int)((100.0-sliderVar1)*(sliderVar2/total));
01508             }
01509             else {
01510                 *(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr)=
01511                     (int)(50-sliderVar1/2);
01512             }
01513             *(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr)=
01514                 100-*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr)
01515                 -*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01516 
01517             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[0]=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01518             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[1]=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01519             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[2]=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01520 
01521             return 1;
01522         }
01523         if(mode_course_valueslider2.detect()) {
01524             double sliderVar1,sliderVar2,sliderVar3,total;
01525             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01526             Department* cur_dept_ptr = department_array[deptRecno];
01527             sliderVar1=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01528             sliderVar2=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01529             sliderVar3=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01530             total=sliderVar1+sliderVar3;
01531             if(total>1E-9) {
01532                 *(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr)=
01533                     (int)((100.0-sliderVar2)*(sliderVar1/total));
01534             }
01535             else {
01536                 *(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr)=
01537                     (int)(50-sliderVar2/2);
01538             }
01539             *(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr)=
01540                 100-*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr)
01541                 -*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01542 
01543             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[0]=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01544             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[1]=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01545             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[2]=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01546             return 1;
01547         }
01548         if(mode_course_valueslider3.detect()) {
01549             double sliderVar1,sliderVar2,sliderVar3,total;
01550             int deptRecno = department_array.selected_recno;
01551             Department* cur_dept_ptr = department_array[deptRecno];
01552             sliderVar1=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01553             sliderVar2=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01554             sliderVar3=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01555             total=sliderVar1+sliderVar2;
01556             if(total>1E-9) {
01557                 *(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr)=
01558                     (int)((100.0-sliderVar3)*(sliderVar1/total));
01559             }
01560             else {
01561                 *(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr)=
01562                     (int)(50-sliderVar3/2);
01563             }
01564             *(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr)=
01565                 100-*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr)
01566                 -*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01567             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[0]=*(mode_course_valueslider1.var_ptr);
01568             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[1]=*(mode_course_valueslider2.var_ptr);
01569             cur_dept_ptr->course_preference_input[2]=*(mode_course_valueslider3.var_ptr);
01570             return 1;
01571         }
01572     }
01573 
01574     return 0;
01575 }
